evidence.claim: Shamaym utilizes AWS services for deployment and data storage.
They comply with HIPAA regulations as part of their service offering.
Their platform supports FHIR standards for healthcare data interoperability.
Shamaym integrates with EHR systems via HL7 and X12 standards.
The company employs AWS for infrastructure, including serverless components.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence found linking Shamaym to X12 transactions or clearinghouse operations.
